CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(KLWSpec__c),ISBLANK(Drawing__c)), Name__c, CASE(TEXT(Order.Region__c), '3', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameRUS__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', '19', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameRUS__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', '13', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.NameUKR__c + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')', KLWSpec__r.SpecBase__r.ProductType__r.Name + ' ' + Drawing__r.AxLoadType__r.Name + ' ('+ KLWSpec__r.Name +' / ' + Drawing__r.Name + ')' ) )
CustomField.label: KLW Item Name
